price: 54. And they (disbelievers) plotted to kill ‘Îsâ [(Jesus) عليه السلام], and Allâh plotted too. And Allâh is the Best of those who plot.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ وَمَكَرَ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wamakarū wamakara al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna
